Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 51st/Campbell

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed at Francisco
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to debris on the tracks

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
